name: BLUE FENCER
description:
== Controls ==
You can use your computer's keyboard or any joystick or controller device supported by Window's DirectInput.

= The default key =
Arrow keys : movement
Z : Attack(Enter)
X : Jump(Cancel)
Space bar: Pauses and menu screen
ESC : Ends the game

== Action ==
Up+Z : Pin wheel
ZZZ : Strong blade
Down+X : Dash attack
Up+X : High jump
C : Executioner
